title: The Strange Saga of the Uzbek Tour de France Femmes Team With One Rider Left
content:
‘Change the rules and we won’t come here’: Tashkent City team manager on bunch bullying, riders leaving in shame, and ‘couch critics with beer and chips’

Read the full article at The Strange Saga of the Uzbek Tour de France Femmes Team With One Rider Left on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
